item.title: Custom Mechanical Keyboard
item.description: Overview The Keychron K10 Pro is a full-size mechanical keyboard known for its hot-swappable switches, QMK/VIA programmability, and multi-device support. Features Hot-swappable switch support — swap switches without soldering Bluetooth + wired modes QMK/VIA customizable layouts 1000 Hz polling rate and responsive typing feel Drawback Some community feedback suggests occasional quality control issues and customer support limitations, common in affordable custom keyboards. Verdict Excellent for development and gaming workflows if you value programmability and typing feel, but expect to manage minor quirks.

item.title: Classic Gaming Mouse
item.description: Overview The Logitech G502 HERO is one of the most popular wired gaming mice of the last decade, known for its precision sensor, programmability, and ergonomic shape. Design & Ergonomics It’s built for right-handed users, with a thumb rest and comfortable grip, making it suitable for long sessions — whether gaming or designing. The adjustable weights let you customize the feel for your hand and playstyle. Performance The next-generation HERO sensor delivers up to 25,600 DPI tracking with minimal smoothing or filtering, ensuring precise and responsive input — ideal for competitive gaming.
